alert.note: Alert for Henry; Rock Island (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 3:28PM CDT until March 31 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ROCK ISLAND...NORTHWESTERN HENRY AND SOUTHEASTERN SCOTT COUNTIES... At 327 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pleasant Valley, or near Bettendorf, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Rock Island, northwestern Henry and southeastern Scott Counties, including the following locations... Silvis Heights, Barstow, Pleasant Valley, Campbells Island, Sunny Hill Estates, Rock Island Arsenal, Illiniwek Forest Preserve, Dayton, Panorama Park and Carbon Cliff. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northwestern Illinois...and east central Iowa.
